## rotationY44 variable

Constructs a 4x4 matrix Y rotation matrix for given `theta`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rotationY44: (out: import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec | null, theta: number) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec
```
